      • suggestUpgradePack

        public UpgradePack suggestUpgradePack(String clusterName,
                                      StackId sourceStackId,
                                      StackId targetStackId,
                                      Direction direction,
                                      org.apache.ambari.spi.upgrade.UpgradeType upgradeType,
                                      String preferredUpgradePackName)
                               throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Get right Upgrade Pack, depends on stack, direction and upgrade type information
        Parameters:
        clusterName - The name of the cluster
        sourceStackId - the "from" stack for this upgrade/downgrade
        targetStackId - the "to" stack for this upgrade/downgrade
        direction - Direction of the upgrade
        upgradeType - The UpgradeType
        preferredUpgradePackName - For unit test, need to prefer an upgrade pack since multiple matches can be found.
        Returns:
        UpgradeType object
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException

      • createSequence

        public List<UpgradeGroupHolder> createSequence(UpgradePack upgradePack,
                                               UpgradeContext context)
                                        throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Generates a list of UpgradeGroupHolder items that are used to execute either an upgrade or a downgrade.
        Parameters:
        upgradePack - the upgrade pack
        context - the context that wraps key fields required to perform an upgrade
        Returns:
        the list of holders
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException

      • getTaskResource

        public Resource getTaskResource(String clusterName,
                                Long requestId,
                                Long stageId,
                                Long taskId)
                         throws UnsupportedPropertyException,
                                NoSuchResourceException,
                                NoSuchParentResourceException,
                                SystemException
        Get a single resource for the task with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        clusterName - Cluster Name
        requestId - Request Id
        stageId - Stage Id
        taskId - Task Id
        Returns:
        Single task resource that matches the predicates, otherwise, null.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedPropertyException
        NoSuchResourceException
        NoSuchParentResourceException
        SystemException

      • updateDesiredRepositoriesAndConfigs

        public void updateDesiredRepositoriesAndConfigs(UpgradeContext upgradeContext)
                                         throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Updates the various repositories and configurations for services participating in the upgrade or downgrade. The following actions are performed in order:
        • The desired repository for every service and component is changed
        • The UpgradeState of every component host is moved to either UpgradeState.IN_PROGRESS or UpgradeState.NONE.
        • In the case of an upgrade, new configurations and service configurations are created if necessary. In the case of a downgrade, any configurations created by the upgrade are reverted.
        Parameters:
        upgradeContext - the upgrade context holding all relevent upgrade information (not null).
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException

      • publishDesiredRepositoriesUpdates

        public void publishDesiredRepositoriesUpdates(UpgradeContext upgradeContext)
                                       throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
